localised_description: Do not look upon sorrowful gods, for where Isha’s tears fall and swell, the secret you seek shall reside.
Do not look upon sorrowful gods, for where Isha’s tears fall and swell, the secret you seek shall reside.
Not all wonders are created by the gods themselves. Some are mortal creations, wherein lies what you seek.
While the flora of the world is exquisite in its danger and beauty, it has always been the fauna that poses the greatest threat.
Not all wonders are created by the gods themselves. Some are mortal creations, wherein lies what you seek.
It rises from Manann’s firmament, like a tooth unfettered from a yearning maw. But this fang’s crown may be worth more than mere gold…
This mouth may lack tongue and lips, yet it shall never close, for it has a thirst that can rarely be quenched.
The world is blighted with these monuments to fear - the sightless eyes and leering grin conceal the riches held within.
It is not X that marks the spot, but the scrawls etched by ancients long thought lost.
Do not look upon sorrowful gods, for where Isha’s tears fall and swell, the secret you seek shall reside.
